actions.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.3059.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to convey the vessel S/S AMERICAN VICTORY to the Battle of the Atlantic Historical Society for use as a Merchant Marine memorial, for historical preservation, and for educational activities.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to convey the vessel S/S American Victory to the Battle of the Atlantic Historical Society for use as a Merchant Marine memorial, for historical preservation, and for educational activities if certain conditions are met.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to convey the vessel S/S AMERICAN VICTORY to the Battle of the Atlantic Historical Society for use as a Merchant Marine memorial, for historical preservation, and for educational activities.
